short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experimental Chrome App for ICT4D projects

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app is a proof-of-concept demo for the international development community (ICT4D). This Chrome app is written in standard web languages, requires no hosting fees, and runs offline. This version is an illustration of:

- Connecting to Ona's API
- Building a Chrome App that runs offline

The code is open source and can be reused to build mobile apps for Android and iOS:
https://github.com/jcontini/ict4d-tools
